index 99ce8e6..b2851c0 100644
--- a/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.test.tsx
+++ b/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.test.tsx
@@ -1,10 +1,10 @@
 import * as React from 'react';
-import { shallow } from 'enzyme';
+import { render } from '@testing-library/react';
 import TestComponentPropUtils from '../../../utils/TestComponentPropUtils';
-import Markdown from './Markdown';
+import { Markdown } from './Markdown';
 
 describe('Markdown', () => {
 	it('renders without crashing', () => {
-		shallow(<Markdown />);
+		render(<Markdown />);
 	});
 });
diff --git a/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.tsx b/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.tsx
index ae79b97..c1e0c87 100644
--- a/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.tsx
+++ b/src/components/modules/Markdown/Markdown.tsx
@@ -28,10 +28,10 @@ export default class Markdown extends React.Component<IProps> {
 					styles.Markdown,
 					this.props.className,
 				)}
-				escapeHtml={true}
-				renderers={{
-					code: MarkdownCodeBlock,
-				}}
+				// Removed escapeHtml prop as it does not exist in the current react-markdown version's Options type.
+components={{
+				code: ({node, ...props}) => <MarkdownCodeBlock {...props} />
+			}}
 				skipHtml={true}
 				source={this.props.src}
 			/>
